docs.snippet: President-elect Donald Trump gave a videotaped deposition on Thursday for a lawsuit stemming from a clash with a celebrity restaurateur at his new Washington hotel. It was a rare legal proceeding for a president-elect or sitting president that hig...
docs.lead_paragraph: President-elect Donald Trump gave a videotaped deposition on Thursday for a lawsuit stemming from a clash with a celebrity restaurateur at his new Washington hotel. It was a rare legal proceeding for a president-elect or sitting president that highlights the legal woes that could follow Trump to the Oval Office.

headline.main: Trump, Amid Legal Battles, Gives Deposition Against Chef
headline.print_headline: Trump, Amid Legal Battles, Gives Deposition Against Chef
